content.rendered:
During surveillance, a federal agent witnesses the target being attacked in his home by a hit squad. The man must protect his target’s life from a room fifty miles away.

Directed By Matt Eskandari

Written By Brandon Stiefer

Stars: Kevin Dillon. Bruce Willis. Oliver Trevena
